item.title: About
item.description: Hi I’m Carlos I’m an Android developer, I currently live in Mexico City. I’m passionate about the technology in mobile development and Linux desktops. I studied a career in “Ciencias de la InformÃ¡tica” at IPN UPIICSA. I also like to create some personal designs using Gravit Design or Figma and I usually plublish them on uplabs.com and instagram. Currently I’m in progress to get my degree and meanwhile I did the next:

item.title: Projects
item.description: Fondo for Android This app allows you to put a beautiful wallpaper from unsplash.com using a simple user interface that allows you either scroll recent photos or typing a search term. ðŸ”— Download from Google Play ðŸ”— Source code from Github Fondo for Linux This app allows you to put a beautiful wallpaper from unsplash.com using a simple user interface that allows you either scroll recent photos or typing a search term.
